title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 35.4 - Labeling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 35.4 - Labeling

State Regulations
(a) Name and
address. In addition to the name and address of the manufacturer, packer or
distributor as required pursuant to the provisions of section
201
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, each package of milk whether or not it is
standardized, shall bear the name and address or a number assigned by the
commissioner, identifying the plant where the milk was processed and
packaged. (b) Milk fat content. Packages of milk may be labeled to show its milk fat content. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
35.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
